佔上風.definition: to take the lead; to gain the upper hand

佔中.definition: Occupy Central, Hong Kong civil disobedience movement (September 2014 -)

佔便宜.definition: advantageous; favorable; to benefit at others' expense; to take unfair advantage

佔優勢.definition: to predominate; to occupy a dominant position

佔去.definition: to take up (one's time etc); to occupy (one's attention etc); to account for (a proportion of sth)

佔壓.definition: to tie up (funds or resources etc that could otherwise be used)

佔有.definition: to have; to own; to hold; to occupy; to possess; to account for (a high proportion etc)

佔為己有.definition: to appropriate to oneself (what rightfully belongs to others)

佔領.definition: to capture; to seize; to occupy by force
